    Heatmap

    DEGp_Pheat.Rd

    plot heatmap with selected gene

    Usage

    DEGp_Pheat(
  df,
  gene,
  pheno,
  outdir,
  f_mark = "",
  nlevel = 8,
  pic_w = 6,
  pic_h = 8,
  c_w = 1,
  c_h = 10,
  f_z = 12,
  f_z.col = 8,
  angle = "90",
  cluster_rows = T,
  cluster_cols = F
)

    Arguments

    df

    dataframe or matrix, the exprs data(rowname is gene name)

    gene

    character, the gene name that heatmap show

    pheno

    dataframe, the group info

    outdir

    character, dir name

    f_mark

    character, special part of filename

    nlevel

    number, the group's factor level

    pic_w

    number, picture width

    pic_h

    number, picture height

    c_w

    number, ceil width

    c_h

    number, ceil height

    f_z

    number, font size

    f_z.col

    number, col font size

    angle

    character, col angle

    Value

    #

    Examples

    #
